public boolean isUnspawnable(int item) {

return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

item.description:
@mellen wrote:

ok now this is my command but i has one error in it that ive got no clue how to fix
here is the command

[code]if (playerCommand.equals(“item”)) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt

(playerCommand.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt

(playerCommand.substring(13));

 if(!isUnspawnable(newItemID)) {
      if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
           c.getItems().addItem(newItemID,

newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t spawn this item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100”);
}[/code]
here is the error

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:389: cannot find symbol symbol : method isUnspawnable(int) location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands if(!isUnspawnable(newItemID)) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. item.title: How to make certain items unspawnable [pi]317
item.dc:creator: @mellen mellen
item.description:
@mellen wrote:

ok this was my old command before i switched to pickup server

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

now this is my command now and i get 4 errors when i compile it.

[code]if (playerCommand.equals(“item”)) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring

(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring

(13));

 if(!isUnspawnable(newItemID)) {
      if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
           addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
      } else {
           c.sendMessage("No such item.");
      }
 	  } else {
 	       c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item.");
 }

} else {
c.sendMessage(“Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100”);
}[/code]

and here is the 4 errors i get when i compile it

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:386: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:387: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:389: cannot find symbol symbol : method Unspawnable(int) location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands if(!Unspawnable(newItemID)) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:391: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

[code]
public int unspawnable[] = {ITEMID,ITEMID,ITEMID};

public boolean isUnspawnable(int item) {
for(int i = 0; i < unspawnable.length; i++) {
if(unspawnable[i] == item)
return true;
}
return false;
}[/code]

and this is the command but i get one error when i compile the command

if (PlayerCommand.equals("item")) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if(!isUnspawnable(newItemID)) { if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("You can't spawn this item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } }

}

item.title: How to make certain items unspawnable [pi]317
item.dc:creator: @mellen mellen
item.description:
@mellen wrote:

the title says it all i can get anywhere from a link to a guide or a simple explanation

well i found a code can some1 tell me what to do with it?
here it is

if (cmd[0].equals(“item”)) {
if (cmd[1].equals("###") || cmd[1].equals("###") || cmd[1].equals("###")) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You cannot spawn that.”);
} else {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
}
}
